channel.title: Psychology on mostlymaths.net
channel.description: Recent content in Psychology on mostlymaths.net

item.title: 2020#38 Readings of the Week
item.description: Skipped last week ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ This week has more machine learning than usual for no special reason. Posting this at 4 AM because for some reason I could not sleep and decided I may as well finish this.

item.title: 2020#37 Readings of the Week
item.description: First edition of the New Year. As eclectic as usual, I hope. The audio-based monitoring of servers and the weird uses of the GPT-2 neural network could be two highlights.

item.title: 2019#36 Readings of the Week
item.description: On time this week. Nothing remarkable: I’m winding down a bit my reading (both articles and books) in preparation for the yearly review and having some cooldown period.

item.title: 2019#32-33 Readings of the Week
item.description: Yeah, I skipped last week. On Saturday Python Barcelona organised PyDay 2019, and I was one of the organisers aside from giving a workshop on PySpark, so I felt pretty tired on Sunday. Of course this means this is a double issue.
